registrationCodeDesc: You need an access code to create an account
needInvitation: Do you need an invitation? Send an email to

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.success: Your password has been changed successfully.
resetPassword.error: An error occurred while changing password. Please try again.

error.emptyCode: Your reset password link doesn't contain code to verify your identity

forgotPassword.successMessage: If there's an account associated with the provided email address, we've sent an email with a link to reset your password.

welcomeSubtitle: Change your mailing list into business
appDesc: Paid mailing 📩 is the best way to deliver today premium materials for your community, straight to their inbox 📬.
appDesc2: You focus on creating valuable content. We will handle the rest.

loginByEmail.title: Log in with your e-mail (passwordless)
loginByEmail.setPassword: Set a password for your account and log in using it
loginByEmail.changePassword: Change the password for your account

auth.invalid-email: Invalid email associated with the link. Please correct the email in the field below.

sendLink.successMessage: If your account exists in the application, we sent a message to the e-mail address provided with a link thanks to which you can log in.

passwordErrors.auth/wrong-password: The current password provided is incorrect
passwordErrors.auth/requires-recent-login: You can only set a password within a short period of time after logging in. Log in again to set the password.

checkYourEmail: A new login link has been sent. Check your mailbox.
acceptEnd: __PAGE_TITLE__ service and I accept its terms.

alert.description: This page is intended for users with access to the product <bold>{{productName}}</bold>.
alert.callToAction: Log in or buy the product to continue.
